data.text:
A few weeks passed since I started helping 
Mihono Bourbon train in secret.
*huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Hng!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
*pant pant* 
That's... a new record!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I appreciate your encouragement. 
When my stamina recovers, I will checkout the lactic acid 
tolerance branch... And proceed towards the slope.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: Let's try one more run today.

data.text:
Advice recognized. Input parsed. 
Flowchart updated. Added one more run up the slope.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Energy recovered. Proceding to run up the slope.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
So far, she has not once complained about my 
difficult training. She acts like it's nothing.
Before I knew it, her total determination had captured me.
*huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I realized that with enough time, she might actually 
be able to partake in medium and long races. 
But then...

So you're the trainer who let her do long-distance 
training behind my back?
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
Mihono Bourbon's real trainer called me over after 
he realized what happened. Her behavior 
during trainings had changed over time.

Master, the nightly trainings were all my own decision. 
Thus, this person has no relation to it.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
He was with you every night, of course he's related to it! 
At the very least, he pitied you and watched.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
She's told me about the Triple Crown many times, 
but I can't have her take any risks! You're a trainer, 
so you must understand that as well.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
Even so, I joined this academy to attain the Triple Crown. 
I have no intention of altering my objective.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Mihono Bourbon's trainer released a deep sigh 
after hearing her stubborn response.

*sigh* Okay, you get one more chance to show you're 
capable of it. Show me you can run run 3 kilometers, 
like the Kikka Sho. Right now.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text: Understood.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: I will persuade you.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
She quickly heads over to the race track and starts 
on the 3000 meters. To be honest, I doubt she will 
be able to complete it with her current stamina...
*huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
(1600 meters passed. Lap time is good. 1400 meters left...) 
(Disturbance in breathing rhythm detected. Pace is decreasing 
and failing to keep consistency.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: Hng!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Just like I thought. Her pace slowed after 2 kilometers and 
she was barely able to walk when she crossed the finish line.
*huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
See? Give up already. It's a waste of time to continue. 
You're not cut out for longer race distances.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
I've seen her willingness to train for the Triple Crown. 
I know how determined she is to reach it.

choices.text: Why won't you let her follow her dreams?
choices.processed: <size=40>Why won't you let her follow her dreams?</size>

data.text: She is the one who would suffer through her own bad decision to go after something she's not cut out for. What do you not understand about that?
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
Stop, I don't want to get into an argument with you. 
Bourbon, I need to know how you really feel, 
now that you've tried running that 3 kilometers.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text: How I really feel...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: She looked confused, but then started speaking.

I my goal of the Triple Crown is hardcoded... 
I apologize....
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: So please, Master...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I see. Then I will let you do what you wish... 
On the condition that we end our contract 
right here, right now.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
...... 
I accept your proposal.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
To think you were so foolish... 
You disappoint me, Bourbon.
data.name: Veteran Trainer

data.text:
Mihono Bourbon's trainer left the race course 
without saying another word after that..

choices.text: Are you okay after all that?

data.text:
Due to the loss of my Master, I have entered 
a state best described as 'bewildered.'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
Even after all that nighttime training, I still 
wasn't able to complete a 3000 meter run.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
My objective for the Triple Crown is a constant. 
And yet, I'm starting to doubt whether it was 
the correct choice.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: Of course it's the right choice!

data.text:
She managed to train hard every day without complaining. 
But more importantly, she has an immense passion for it.
A burning passion to attain the Triple Crown!

choices.text: I support you, no matter what others say!
choices.processed: <size=40>I support you, no matter what others say!</size>

choices.text: I support you, no matter what others say!
choices.processed: <size=40>I support you, no matter what others say!</size>

choices.text: I will help you fulfill your dream!
I will help you fulfill your dream!

data.text: Her eyes started to quiver a little.
You'll help...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

choices.text: I won't let you give up on your dream!
choices.processed: <size=43>I won't let you give up on your dream!</size>

choices.text: I won't let you give up on your dream!
choices.processed: <size=43>I won't let you give up on your dream!</size>

data.text: (Their gaze... It feels familiar.)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text: *huff huff* *sniffle* I failed again, Father... I am just not...
data.name: Young Bourbon

data.text: You may not have enough stamina, yet you keep on trying. That is why I know that one day, you will succeed.
data.name: Bourbon's Father

data.text: I will help you fulfill that dearest dream of yours!
data.name: Bourbon's Father

data.text: (They remind me of my father...)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I could not bear the silence and called out to her. 
She stood there, quietly looking at me.

You customized my running style. The improvement 
of my 1600 meters record is all thanks to your skill.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
I think reaching my objective might be 
a possibility with your help.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
So please, I want you to be my trainer... 
...My Master.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon

data.text:
The right hand of this "cyborg" had a firm grip, 
yet also felt strangely comfortable and warm.
